com.rexsl.test
Interface JsonDocument

All Known Subinterfaces:
TestResponse
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleJson
public interface JsonDocument

Json document.

Set of convenient Json manipulations:

Implementation of this interface shall be immutable and thread-safe.

Since:
0.4
Version:
$Id: JsonDocument.java 1758 2012-05-28 14:51:16Z guard $
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@rexsl.com)

Method Summary
 List<String> json(String query)
          Find and return text elements or attributes matched by json.

Method Detail

json

List<String> json(@NotNull
                  String query)
Find and return text elements or attributes matched by json.

The Json query should point to text elements or attributes in the Json document. If any nodes of different types (elements, comments, etc.) are found in result node list - an AssertionError will be thrown.

Parameters:
query - The Json query
Returns:
The list of string values (texts)

nodesJson

List<JsonDocument> nodesJson(@NotNull
                             String query)
Retrieve nodes from the Json response.

Parameters:
query - The Json query
Returns:
Collection of responses
